SQL.LOAD: SELECT workqueue_item_id, workqueue_id, user_id, time_stamp, history_action_id, reason, workqueue_item_desc, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, workqueue_item_hist_id FROM elp_workqueue_item_history WHERE workqueue_item_hist_id = :workqueue_item_hist_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_workqueue_item_history SET workqueue_item_id = :workqueue_item_id, workqueue_id = :workqueue_id, user_id = :user_id, time_stamp = :time_stamp, history_action_id = :history_action_id, reason = :reason, workqueue_item_desc = :workqueue_item_desc, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE workqueue_item_hist_id = :workqueue_item_hist_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_workqueue_item_history ( workqueue_item_id, workqueue_id, user_id, time_stamp, history_action_id, reason, workqueue_item_desc, created_by, workqueue_item_hist_id ) VALUES ( :workqueue_item_id, :workqueue_id, :user_id, :time_stamp, :history_action_id, :reason, :workqueue_item_desc, :created_by, :workqueue_item_hist_id )
SQL.LOAD_WORKQUEUE_HISTORY: SELECT workqueue_item_id, workqueue_id, elp_user.user_name, time_stamp, workqueue_item_desc, history_action_id, reason, workqueue_item_hist_id FROM elp_workqueue_item_history inner join elp_user on elp_user.user_id = ELP_WORKQUEUE_ITEM_HISTORY.user_id WHERE workqueue_id = :workqueue_id
SQL.LOAD_WORKQUEUE_USERS_ACTIONS: select elp_user.user_name, count(history_action_id) as Items_Accessed, sum(decode(history_action_id, GetItemIdFromListAndItem('WQ_HIST_ACTION', 'REDR'), 1, 0)) As Items_Redirected, sum(decode(history_action_id, GetItemIdFromListAndItem('WQ_HIST_ACTION', 'REQU'), 1, 0)) As Items_Requeued, sum(decode(history_action_id, GetItemIdFromListAndItem('WQ_HIST_ACTION', 'PROC'), 1, 0)) As Items_Processed from ELP_WORKQUEUE_ITEM_HISTORY inner join elp_user on elp_user.user_id = ELP_WORKQUEUE_ITEM_HISTORY.user_id where WORKQUEUE_ID = :workqueue_id group by elp_user.user_name
